Projects.name: Industrial Technology Research Institute
Projects.desription: Contributed to the research and development of a digital nursing chatbot in collaboration with the Ministry of Health and Welfare utilizing Streamlit and a Retrieval-Augmented Generation LLM model.

Projects.name: AguaClara
Projects.desription: Designed and developed a new team website by identifying issues and redesigning the information architecture to build a user-friendly and scalable platform, enhancing information accessibility and resulting in a 50% increase in page views within the first three months of deployment.

Projects.name: Women In Computing at Cornell
Projects.desription: I play a role in redesigning and implementing our website, focusing on enhancing user flow, modernizing design, and revamping code for better performance. Working closely with two team members, my responsibilities include ensuring sleek aesthetics, functional excellence, and content accuracy. This project not only contributes to the organization's outreach but also serves as a valuable platform for my professional growth in web development and design.

Projects.name: WICC Workshop
Projects.desription: I led the organization of an annual technical workshop with a focus on expanding computing skills among Cornell students. The workshop content covered important areas such as website project structure, modular components, and deployment methods, and was designed to accommodate students with varying levels of computing experience. I collaborated closely with committee members to plan and execute the workshop, ensuring a supportive learning environment for all participants.

Projects.name: ConsenCity
Projects.desription: During a 24-hour hackathon (Big Red Hacks!), my team developed a web application to improve transparency in local government policymaking. Our project, which facilitated public access to policy information, won the best software award for its innovation and impact on civic engagement.

Projects.name: Glimpse
Projects.desription: Glimpse is a website/app designed to make it easy for friends to stay connected and updated on each other's lives. By signing up with your friend group, you will receive a monthly email with prompts about your lives. Simply respond to the prompts and share any photos or videos you like. Friends can log into their accounts to view their memories over time and customize prompts.

Projects.name: Research
Projects.desription: I am the sole author of a research paper published in an academic journal. In this paper, I developed an image-based land-use classNameifier using transfer learning with a pre-trained ResNet-18 convolutional neural network using PyTorch. I demonstrated the effectiveness of transfer learning for image classNameification by conducting a comprehensive analysis of the resulting data. I identified key trends and insights from the data, and presented the results in a clear and concise manner.
